name: Judgment of the Monolith
summary: You can use your ka stone to compel the truth.
description:
You can use the oaths bound in your ka stone to compel the truth from the living and the dead. You can activate your ka stone to target a single living creature, causing that creature to experience the effects of being in a zone of truth. You can also activate it with a 10-minute activation (envision) to cast talking corpse.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
